profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.8 XMP Extension Schemas - PDF/A Extension Schema
profile.description: The required PDF/A Extension Schema namespace prefix is pdfaExtension.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The required PDF/A Extension Schema namespace prefix is pdfaExtension.

error.message: A PDF/A Extension Schema namespace prefix is %1, but shall be "pdfaExtension".
